HomePage.title: FolderPort
HomePage.description: Share folders quickly and securely from anywhere

share.title: Share Folder
share.description: Select a folder to share and generate a sharing link for easy access

access.title: Access Folder
access.description: Quickly access shared folders using the sharing link

oneClick.title: One-Click Share
oneClick.description: No software installation needed. Start sharing right from your browser with secure P2P technology

preview.title: Instant Preview
preview.description: Preview images, audio, and video files instantly for a seamless sharing experience

unlimited.title: Unlimited Transfer
unlimited.description: Transfer files of any size without limitations. Say goodbye to file splitting hassles

security.title: Encrypted Protection
security.description: Set AES passphrase for encryption, ensuring your data is secure throughout the transfer process

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Full support for Windows, Mac, and Android. Access from iOS devices. Share from anywhere

directorySelector.title: Select a folder to share
directorySelector.description: Select a folder and click the share button to share the folder content.

unsupported.title: Unsupported to share folder
unsupported.description: Your current browser or device does not support the file system access feature. Please try using the latest version of modern browsers. Or try to select files to share instead.

multiFilesSelector.title: Select files to share
multiFilesSelector.description: Select files and click the share button to share the files.

passphrase.description: Set AES passphrase to protect your data

upload.title: Allow upload files
upload.description: Allow access to upload files to your shared folder.

connected.scanQRCode: Scan this QR code with your device

disconnected.description: Enter connection ID or paste share link

PassphraseDialog.title: Enter Connection Passphrase
PassphraseDialog.description: Please enter the passphrase to establish a secure connection

status.noConnection: Not connected to the remote device

WorkerStatusTooltip.notRunningTooltip: It may affect file transfer, please try refreshing the page

FileUploadDialog.title: Upload Files
FileUploadDialog.description: Select files to upload to the shared folder
FileUploadDialog.dragFilesHere: Drag files here or click to select
FileUploadDialog.uploadNotAllowed: File upload not allowed by the host
